items.title: Commands
items.text:
• zensical new - Create a new project
  • zensical serve - Start local web server
  • zensical build - Build your site

items.title: Admonitions
items.text:
Go to documentation

Note

This is a note admonition. Use it to provide helpful information.

Warning

This is a warning admonition. Be careful!

items.title: Details
items.text:
Go to documentation

Click to expand for more info

This content is hidden until you click to expand it. Great for FAQs or long explanations.

items.title: Code Blocks
items.text:
Go to documentation

Code blocks
def greet(name):
    print(f"Hello, {name}!") # (1)!

greet("Python")

  1. Go to documentation

    Code annotations allow to attach notes to lines of code.

Code can also be highlighted inline: #!python print("Hello, Python!").

items.title: Content tabs
items.text:
Go to documentation

=== "Python"

``` python
print("Hello from Python!")
```

=== "Rust"

``` rs
println!("Hello from Rust!");
```

items.title: Diagrams
items.text:
Go to documentation

graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Error?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Hmm...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Yay!];

items.title: Footnotes
items.text:
Go to documentation

Here's a sentence with a footnote.[^1]

Hover it, to see a tooltip.

[^1]: This is the footnote.

items.title: Formatting
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • ==This was marked (highlight)==
  • ^^This was inserted (underline)^^
  • ~~This was deleted (strikethrough)~~
  • H~2~O
  • A^T^A
  • ++ctrl+alt+del++

items.title: Maths
items.text:
Go to documentation

$$ \cos x=\sum_{k=0}^{\infty}\frac{(-1)^k}{(2k)!}x^{2k} $$

Needs configuration

Note that MathJax is included via a script tag on this page and is not configured in the generated default configuration to avoid including it in a pages that do not need it. See the documentation for details on how to configure it on all your pages if they are more Maths-heavy than these simple starter pages.

items.title: Task Lists
items.text:
Go to documentation

  • [x] Install Zensical
  • [x] Configure zensical.toml
  • [x] Write amazing documentation
  • [ ] Deploy anywhere

items.title: 升级uv
items.text:
uv self updat

输出

info: Checking for updates...
success: Upgraded uv from v0.9.18 to v0.9.22! https://github.com/astral-sh/uv/releases/tag/0.9.22

items.title: 升级zensical
items.text:
1. 检查当前版本

    uv pip list

    输出

    Package            Version
------------------ -------
click              8.3.1
colorama           0.4.6
cyclic             1.0.0
deepmerge          2.0
markdown           3.10
mdx-include        1.4.2
pygments           2.19.2
pymdown-extensions 10.19.1
pyyaml             6.0.3
rcslice            1.1.0
stepslist          0.7.5
zensical           0.0.13

  2. 管理依赖项，即升级到zensical最新版本

    uv add "zensical>0.0.13" --upgrade-package zensical

    输出

    Resolved 13 packages in 1.27s
Prepared 1 package in 499ms
Uninstalled 1 package in 4.90s
Installed 1 package in 5.31s
- zensical==0.0.13
+ zensical==0.0.15

items.title: 添加stepslist插件
items.text:
• 添加插件包
uv add stepslist
  • 编辑zensical.toml,添加以下内容到最后
# Plugins
# add 2026.01.09 21:08
[project.markdown_extensions.stepslist]

# admonition
[project.markdown_extensions.admonition]
[project.markdown_extensions.pymdownx.details]
[project.markdown_extensions.pymdownx.superfences]
